meanings.definition: Malacostracans: a subclass of crustaceans including crabs, lobsters, and shrimp.
meanings.sent1: The malacostracans scuttled along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study malacostracans to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: Why did the crab invite the lobster to the party? Because malacostracans love to socialize!
meanings.sent4: The shrimp, a tiny malacostracan, danced gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent5: Children at the aquarium were fascinated by the colorful malacostracans in the tank.
